DOC.brief_summary: The aim study evaluate complete acne regimen consist medication ( Benzaknen® 5 % Gel ) , 2 cosmetic product Dermotivin® Soft Liquid soap Cetaphil® Dermacontrol Moisturizer SPF30 patient acne .
DOC.brief_title: Benzac 5 % Gel Combination With Cosmetic Products Acne Vulgaris
DOC.detailed_description: The main objective study evaluate subject satisfaction treatment regimen comprise Benzaknen® 5 % Gel association 2 cosmetic product include foam soap , Dermotivin® Soft Liquid soap , non comedogenic moisturizer , Cetaphil® Dermacontrol Moisturizer SPF30 , patient mild moderate acne , 12 week treatment .
DOC.criteria: Male female subject ethnic background 12 year old . Subject mild moderate facial acne vulgaris define Investigator Global Assessment ( IGA ) score 2 3 04 scale . Subject skin phototype accord T.B . Fitzpatrick skin phototype definition . Subject severe acne ( IGA > 3 ) nodule , cyst , scar extrafacial lesion , Female subject pregnant , lactate plan pregnancy study , Subject susceptible take corticosteroid treatment study except inhale topic need treat condition outside face ,
